languages.text: "Только глупец не найдет в Кредо изъяна, но истинная вера в том, чтобы не искать изъяны".
"Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."
languages.original_text: "Только глупец не найдет в Кредо изъяна, но истинная вера в том, чтобы не искать изъяны".

traits.locale_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith is in not looking for flaws."
"Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith is in not looking for flaws."
"Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."
"Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."
"Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

languages.text: “只有蠢货才会认为教条没有任何缺陷，但真正的信仰在于不去探询那些缺陷。”
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: “只有蠢货才会认为教条没有任何缺陷，但真正的信仰在于不去探询那些缺陷。”

languages.text: «Solo un necio lograría estudiar el Credo sin encontrar faltas, pero la fe verdadera consiste en no buscar esas faltas».
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un necio lograría estudiar el Credo sin encontrar faltas, pero la fe verdadera consiste en no buscar esas faltas».

languages.text: 「信条に欠点を見出せないのは愚か者だけだ。しかし、真の信仰は欠点を探さないことにある」
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: 「信条に欠点を見出せないのは愚か者だけだ。しかし、真の信仰は欠点を探さないことにある」

languages.text: "Nur ein Narr würde im Glauben keinen Fehler finden, doch wahrer Glaube liegt darin, nicht nach Fehlern zu suchen."
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Narr würde im Glauben keinen Fehler finden, doch wahrer Glaube liegt darin, nicht nach Fehlern zu suchen."

languages.text: « Seul un imbécile ne verrait aucune imperfection dans le crédo, mais pour connaître la foi véritable, il faut savoir fermer les yeux sur ces imperfections. »
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: « Seul un imbécile ne verrait aucune imperfection dans le crédo, mais pour connaître la foi véritable, il faut savoir fermer les yeux sur ces imperfections. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca bir sersem İtikat'ta kusur bulamaz. Gerçek inanç, kusur aramamaktır."
languages.original_text: "Only a fool would find no flaw in the Creed, but true faith lies in not looking for flaws."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca bir sersem İtikat'ta kusur bulamaz. Gerçek inanç, kusur aramamaktır."
